Item.sqlserver_body: create procedure get_locked_wbs(@WBS_ID char(32)) as begin DECLARE @WBS_ELEMENTS TABLE(ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default primary key) DECLARE @ACTIVITIES TABLE(ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default primary key) DECLARE @ITEMS TABLE (ID CHAR(32), [TYPE] VARCHAR(32), LOCKED_BY_ID CHAR(32)) INSERT @WBS_ELEMENTS SELECT ID FROM SELECT_WBS_ELEMENTS(@WBS_ID) INSERT @ACTIVITIES SELECT ID FROM SELECT_ACTIVITIES(@WBS_ID) INSERT @ITEMS SELECT W1.ID,'WBS Element',W2.LOCKED_BY_ID FROM @WBS_ELEMENTS W1,WBS_ELEMENT W2 WHERE W1.ID = W2.ID AND W2.LOCKED_BY_ID IS NOT NULL INSERT @ITEMS SELECT A1.ID,'Activity2',A2.LOCKED_BY_ID FROM @ACTIVITIES A1,ACTIVITY2 A2 WHERE A1.ID = A2.ID AND A2.LOCKED_BY_ID IS NOT NULL SELECT * FROM @ITEMS end
Item.name: get_locked_wbs
